p.k: In this chapter René will visit with his teammates the "Center of Reptiles". One of the instructors will tell us a terrible experience of a student in Garonga with a tragic end by snakebite. Chris'll meet an expert on snakes, see how Rachel feeds a chameleon. Participants will learn how to manipulate the black mamba. René give us to know the types of poisons of snakes that live in Africa. We learn the habits, feeding snakes and how to respect them in their natural environment.
